channel.title: 2 Little problems
channel.description:
Problem 1:
Ok i had a server on my old pc... but he was crashed. So i need to buy a new. But i deleted my old settings of my rs sever. Now i do it back. Just the same, but when my 2 friends connect it would. When i type my server ip its works. But when my friends does it doesnt. Whats the problem ???
Problem 2:
This is not a real problem but eh... I just want to let npc talk. I know hot i let npc talk, above him head. (yellow speaking) But i dont know when you click talk How to let em talk xD So i mean he just say like:
If you use here superweapons, your can be lead to a BAN !
---------------------------------------------------------- Pls help me !!

item.title: 2 Little problems
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Go to no-ip.com and make a new ip. Have your friends try that ip. Also, follow this tut to open the port 43594 or whatever your port is in your computer.
http://support.microsoft.com/kb/308127

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Little problems
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Ok, umm, is the port open in your new computer? Did your ip expire? Try getting a new ip from no-ip for them to use.

Problem 2:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=306743.0
A guy solves it there.

Read full topic

Problem 1:

Ok i had a server on my old pc…
but he was crashed.

But i deleted my old settings of my rs sever.
Now i do it back.
Just the same, but when my 2 friends connect it would.
